title: I hate life. Really. The world. Humans. Everything.

thread.content: I hate life. Really. The world. Humans. Everything. I've taken so many different medications. I'm 31, been depressed and getting worse since I was a little girl. Too much trauma, too much sadness, and BS. I hate that I have tried so hard, so many times to be a good person and help other and find purpose and found NOTHING. For over 15 years now. And lately I feel more purposeless and angry as ever. I feel empty and like this is just a horrible dream, I've been in between heaven and hell like a limbo/purgatory punishment place. Where nothing changes... No matter how hard I try. I get nothing. Why am I here?
thread.author: Whylive2suffer

thread.content: Welcome to e health forum. It is possible that due to work, family or any other causes, you are highly stressed and anxious. You may also possibly have anxiety or personality disorder or actually you might be depressed. These conditions are caused due to multiple factors, lifestyle and interpersonal issues and detailed psychiatric history is needed so as to provide you manage the underlying condition. To improve your life and have a proper outlook towards life, it is helpful if you seek a guidance from a external person either in your family or your friends. If you do not have such dependable people then consulting a psychologist or a psychiatrist and undergoing proper counselling will be very helpful to making the proper assessment of your issues. Once diagnosed proper treatment will help you find happiness and content. I hope this helps.
thread.author: Deepak Anvekar
